info.title: POS Docs
info.description: Documentation and Architecture available at: https://jsonapi.org/format/

passwordConfirm.description: Repeat same value as in password field

in.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' IN ('value1', 'value2')"

nin.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' NOT IN ('value1', 'value1')"

eq.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' = 'value1'

ne.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' <> 'value1'

gte.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' >= 'value1'

gt.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' > 'value1'

lt.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' < 'value1'

lte.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' <= 'value1'

regexp.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' ~* value1

some.title: is equal to the conditional of query "WHERE 'attribute_name' && [value1]
